about_the_game:
Get ready to explore a vast universe with 21 planets spread across 7 epic galaxies, each packing a unique elemental punch. Source Energy (green), Gravitational Energy (purple), Static Energy (blue), Magma Energy (orange), Legendary Energy (yellow), and Anti Energy (red)! On each planet, you'll meet enemies with their own unique weapons.

It's not all fun and games tho, cuz each planet is guarded by a wicked Deity. Take 'em down and score some data cubes. You'll need them to triangulate the Ultra Planet, a mind-blowing place with endless resources, rare stuff, and supercharged weapons. And the best part? Ultra crystal gems, baby! Those gems fuel your warp travel, so you better get 'em.

Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to craft the elusive Ultra Ring. It's your golden ticket to unlimited fuel and intergalactic travel. But you gotta work for it, defeat that final Deity on the Ultra Planet, and collect that sweet ultra essence.

But here's the kicker, you might stumble upon a unicorn on your wild journey. And this ain't no ordinary unicorn – it grants you an infinite amount ultra essence, and the ability to travel across all dimensions. A supreme shortcut to victory!

Don't forget to gear up and bring your A-game. Enhance those weapons to counter those elemental baddies. It's all about strategy and skill on this wild ride. Plus, you can tame Deities and ride 'em like a boss! Get those tech traps and show 'em who's the real king of the Galaxy.

We got 24 unique weapons, each with its own wild combo set. Power and weakness are the name of the game! Plan your moves wisely as you'll face off against 7 elemental enhancements and powers. Get ready for an electrifying combat experience.

So are you ready for this epic adventure? The universe is calling, and it's time to show 'em what you're made of! Take the reins on RAINBOW CREAM SAGA and become the legend you set out to be. Let's go, baby!

name: RAINBOW CREAM SAGA

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-12400F
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-950
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2070
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Welcome to RAINBOW CREAM SAGA, a kickass melee action survival game with some RPG vibes! You can craft weapons, build bases, capture mounts and much more! Come through on this epic adventure and test out your survival skills.
